title: Forgive Don't Forget
itunes:title: Forgive Don't Forget
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners are the forgivable type after Lil Fizz apologized to Omarion for dating his baby mom. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Florida nurse for posting jokes about new born baby with severe birth defects and we opened up the phone lines to see what out listeners thought about celebrities using their platform to encourage their fans to take the vaccine.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
